segments.text: Don't take too much off . I'm trying to grow my hair longer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds perfect . Do you think I can get some highlights today , too ? I've always wanted red .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that will over-process your hair , you should wait at least two weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . I'll just have the cut and perm today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great . My assistant will wash your hair , and then I'll be back to help you .
segments.speaker: S2
